trans-unit.source: Use Business Central on Your Mobile Device| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Use Business Central on Your Mobile Device| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Použití Business Central na mobilním zařízení | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can view and edit your Business Central data on your phone or tablet.

seg-source.mrk: You can view and edit your Business Central data on your phone or tablet.

target.mrk: Data z Business Central si můžete prohlížet a upravovat v telefonu nebo tabletu.

trans-unit.source: Getting Business Central on Your Mobile Device

seg-source.mrk: Getting Business Central on Your Mobile Device

target.mrk: Získání Business Central pro mobilní zařízení

trans-unit.source: Access your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data from your mobile device.

seg-source.mrk: Access your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data from your mobile device.

target.mrk: Získejte přístup k datům v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] z mobilního zařízení.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate through your business data, use features such as send to Excel or Office 365, view up-to-date charts and KPIs, email sales quotes and invoices, and shoot and attach pictures with your camera.

seg-source.mrk: You can navigate through your business data, use features such as send to Excel or Office 365, view up-to-date charts and KPIs, email sales quotes and invoices, and shoot and attach pictures with your camera.

target.mrk: Můžete procházet data vašeho podniku, používat funkce jako je odesílání do aplikace Excel nebo Office 365, prohlížení aktuálních grafů a KPI, e-mailových prodejních nabídek, faktur, fotografování a připojení snímků pomocí fotoaparátu.

trans-unit.source: Follow the steps below to download the app and get started.

seg-source.mrk: Follow the steps below to download the app and get started.

target.mrk: Chcete-li aplikaci stáhnout a začít, postupujte podle následujících pokynů.

trans-unit.source: To get the app on my mobile device

seg-source.mrk: To get the app on my mobile device

target.mrk: Jak získat aplikaci na své mobilním zařízení

trans-unit.source: Install the [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] app on your mobile device by downloading the app from the Windows Store, App Store, or Google Play.

seg-source.mrk: Install the [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] app on your mobile device by downloading the app from the Windows Store, App Store, or Google Play.

target.mrk: Nainstalujte si aplikaci [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] na svém mobilním zařízení stažením z Windows Store, App Store nebo Google Play.

trans-unit.source: Launch the app from your mobile device.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the app from your mobile device.

trans-unit.source: Enter your user name and password that you created during sign-up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and follow the instructions on the screen.

seg-source.mrk: Enter your user name and password that you created during sign-up for [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and follow the instructions on the screen.

target.mrk: Zadejte své uživatelské jméno a heslo, které jste vytvořili při registraci do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], a postupujte podle pokynů na obrazovce.

trans-unit.source: You should now have access to [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and be able to view and edit data.

seg-source.mrk: You should now have access to [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and be able to view and edit data.

target.mrk: Nyní byste měli mít přístup do [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a mít možnost zobrazit a upravit data.
